v1.17.0.description: fixes issue where horizontal scroll bars were appearing on IE 10

v1.15.0.description: fixes WCAG 2.0 AA accessibility issues regarding duplicate id's

v1.13.0.description: fixes an issue where additional padding was being added to the module height by the heading component

v1.8.0.description: addresses layout issue where stacked items had too much space at mobile breakpoints
